46DBBA5F231B41079E7B6E4742CCAAD5.description: Read and comprehend complex literary and informational texts independently and proficiently

FF376700CD4A4ABDA567D4CC5D25C586.description: Demonstrate an understanding of the personal choices and moral consequences in literature and apply these to their own life; read to learn more about his/her relationship with God, their faith and traditions.

5CB3B69F2D414BE0B0A6A89EAEBEAE3A.description: Evaluate electronic information sources and make decisions about the accuracy and relevance of such information; become responsible digital citizens.

19FFE7576B6342969D6BBF938DA54DFE.description: Determine central ideas or themes of a text and analyze their development; summarize the key supporting details and ideas.

150429B8A7514CF291D37D769B93142A.description: Assess how authors’ point of view or purpose shapes the content and style of a text.

FF36B40F1A0F4361805192C8450970FB.description: Analyze the structure of texts, including how specific sentences, paragraphs, and larger portions of the text (e.g., a section, chapter, scene, or stanza) relate to each other and the whole.

DAEA758BD6C3441BB6C72F76B6EB646B.description: Read informational texts to acquire new information and to respond to the needs and demands of society and the workplace.

DDE1A0F3FDE640A58225FBF33126638C.description: Use a variety of strategies to comprehend, interpret and evaluate text.

1B9D2B7D1AEE4EC294B69EE16690529E.description: Define and appropriately apply content-related vocabulary words to enrich comprehension and communication skills; clarify the meaning of unknown words by using context clues.

07F509D4912A441B8CFDF8E4F702EDE5.description: Read closely to determine what the text says explicitly and to make logical inferences from it; cite specific textual evidence when writing or speaking to support conclusions drawn from the text to build an understanding of texts, of themselves, and of the cultures of the United States and the world; read a wide range of literature from many periods in many genres to build an understanding of the many dimensions of human experience.
